items.summary: Create a 14-slide INOVICS corporate presentation deck as a PowerPoint (.pptx) using the exact slide-by-slide content provided in the conversation, and apply Option 1 styling aligned to the existing website theme (dark navy background + yellow accent, clean enterprise look, bold headings, minimal bullet points, abstract data/grid visuals, and no stock/cheesy imagery or heavy icons).

Expose the generated PowerPoint deck as a static downloadable asset from the web app (place the .pptx under the frontend public assets) and add a clearly labeled download entry point in the UI so users can download it directly from the site.
